mission.title: ISTE Standards for Educators: A Guide for Teachers and Other Professionals
mission.driving_question: How can we understand, prepare for, and adopt the ISTE Standards for Educators to transform teaching and empower learning?

tasks.task_description: Learn about the seven Educator Standards and their implications for teaching and learning in the digital age.
Think about how to prepare to implement the standards in your educational setting.

tasks.task_title: Adopting and Implementing the ISTE Standards
tasks.task_description: Develop a plan for implementing and adopting the standards in your practice.

pre_thinking_prompts: What are the ISTE Standards for Educators?
Why are these standards important for teaching and learning in the digital age?
How can these standards transform your teaching practice?
mission.reflection_prompt: Reflect on how adopting the ISTE Standards can enhance your teaching practice and empower your learners.
ai_tutor_prompts: Consider how the ISTE Standards align with your current teaching practice.
Think about how you can use technology to enhance learning in your classroom.
Reflect on the challenges and opportunities of implementing the ISTE Standards in your practice.
mission.remix_zone: Adapt and modify this guide to fit your specific educational context and needs.
